title: Technology-Enhanced Teaching Competency Development Program Through Collaborative Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education experience and proficiency in using basic digital tools
context.additional_context: Course where middle school teachers develop technology integration skills by collaborating on language curriculum design using Web 2.0 tools; operated with a practice-focused approach using simulation/VR tools in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners develop three or more language-subject VR simulation activities by applying a collaborative instructional design framework
Learners complete instructional design documents reflecting TPACK (Technological, Pedagogical, and Content Knowledge) elements with 90% or higher accuracy
Learners improve technology-integrated lesson design capabilities by 20% or more through peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
